definition: the quality of excellence in thought and manners and taste
details:
noun
- the quality of excellence in thought and manners and taste
= synonyms: refinement
- a society in an advanced state of social development (e.g., with complex legal and political and religious organizations)
= example: a society in an advanced state of social development (e.g., with complex legal and political and religious organizations)
= synonyms: civilisation
- a particular society at a particular time and place
= example: a particular society at a particular time and place
= synonyms: culture
- the social process whereby societies achieve an advanced stage of development and organization
= synonyms: civilisation
